Title: Invicta Men Subaqua Noma III Dragon Swiss Made Poly Strap Retrograde Date Watch
Description: Invicta Subaqua Noma III Dragon Swiss Made Quartz Chronograph Black and Green Silicone Strap DAY Retrograde Men Watch 10187 We Ship Worldwide Brand New In Invicta Signature II Collection Grey Box W/ Warranty & Manual List Price $1,695.00 3 Year Manufacturer Warranty High-contrast, eye-catching style with precision power and a distinct sport aesthetic. Driven by the reliable Swiss Ronda 8040.N Quartz Chronograph movement, this edition of the Subaqua Noma III dives in with a round black stainless steel case outfitted with a bar protector over the screw down crown. Set on top, a unidirectional rotating bezel with a raised diver's scale and three luminous Tritnite accented barrels surrounds the Flame Fusion crystal. The Invicta name in your choice of green or white appears on the left side of the case. The black sunray dial hosts a big date window at 6:00 and shows a day retrograde from 11:00 to 1:00. White Arabic numerals occupy all remaining hour positions. Subdials in 1/10 second, seconds and 30-minute formats exist near 3:00, 6:00, and 9:00, respectively. The Swiss Made stamp surfaces below 6:00. Luminous accented black hour and minute hands indicate the time along side subdial hands and a luminous accented chronograph hand that coordinate with your chosen accent color. A black silicone rubber strap decorated with the Subaqua logo on the sides secures with a black buckle clasp engraved with the Invicta logo. The double keepers and the logo on the strap match the selected accent color. The strap fits up to approximately a 9" wrist.
